Summary: Black choppers like that appeared after the craft yesterday.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Martin
There were no other sightings in Martin on or around April 12th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsFollowing my report yesterday there was two appeared to be identical as that appeared after the craft sighting go through the same area as the mystery crafts hovered a bit yesterday they came from a slightly more south direction and were much slower today as they approached they changed course a bit and went over the area where the crafts hovered yesterday and then took the exact course as the 3 following choppers did yesterday along with the preceding mystery crafts.
